description: This file defines the ArrayVariable class, which extends BaseVariable and models a dynamic list of BaseVariable types for Java (and C). It includes methods for resolving references, encoding, decoding, and generating Java and C types for these variables, specifically handling arrays with support for custom types. It uses external classes such as Processor, PojoWrapper, and ICArrayVariable.

classes.name: ArrayVariable
classes.description: Represents a dynamic list of BaseVariable types for Java or C, with encoding and decoding capabilities.

methods.name: ArrayVariable
methods.description: Constructor that initializes ArrayVariable with a given ICArrayVariable bean.

methods.name: getFirstElement
methods.description: Returns the first element type of the array.

methods.name: resolveReferences
methods.description: Resolves the element type of the array by examining the bean's properties and fetching the corresponding BaseVariable.

methods.name: isArray
methods.description: Indicates that this variable represents an array: returns true.

methods.name: isPtr
methods.description: Indicates that this variable is a pointer type: returns true.

methods.name: getJavaBaseType
methods.description: Returns the base Java type of the array elements, converting 'int' to 'Integer' and applying camelCase.

methods.name: getJavaType
methods.description: Returns the Java type string for the array, which is an ArrayList of the base type.

methods.name: getCtype
methods.description: Returns the C type for the array, which is 'icLinkedList'.

methods.name: getJsonKey
methods.description: Returns the JSON key corresponding to this variable, which is its name.

methods.name: getNativeEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code to encode the array into JSON, iterating over linked list elements and encoding each.

methods.name: getNativeDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code to decode a JSON array into the linked list, creating elements and setting their values.

methods.name: getJavaEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code to encode the array into a JSON array.

methods.name: getJavaDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code to decode a JSON array into an ArrayList.

methods.name: getJavaIpcObjectType
methods.description: Returns null, as ArrayVariable is not supported as IPC object.
